name: CPLAY Network
description: CPLAY Network is a privacy-protected crypto ecosystem that is going to launch the world's first global crypto app store including non custodial wallet, adstation, and super secure 2FA shield software. Project vision is to provide one-stop solution for cryptocurrency users, business platforms, advertisers, and ad publishers. CPLAY network is going to establish a privacy-protected crypto ecosystem where the entire ecosystem will be driven by its governance token CPLAY. We will connect global crypto users, entrepreneurs, and businesses by creating privacy protected bridge between all crypto platforms like Wallets, Exchanges, Sportsbooks, Gambling, Games, media, Advertiser, and others.
